configuration_setting.description: This xml file is used to control the configuration of the storefront advanced search on a per store basis. By providing the appropriate configuration search fields and values can be specified.
configuration_setting.default_value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!-- Configuration file for advanced search --><!-- For range values, lower bounds are inclusive, upper values are exclusive. --><IntelligentBrowsing></IntelligentBrowsing>
